reviewText: everyone you know needs to watch these
Excellent, thought provoking work, worth viewing (and owning). Was warned about video quality but can be overlooked given the subject matter.
Received product on time in good condition. Look forward to the lessons to be learned in these works. All of Mr. Curtis' works are masterpieces.

Before buying this set, I had already seen the first two installments of "All Watched Over by Machines of Loving Grace" and I was blown away. Adam Curtis is a genius. The writing, narration, archival footage, and editing are excellent. I'm buying the set so I can share with others. Somebody should create a college course based on the series. Even if you think you don't like documentaries, this will capture your imagination if you give it a chance.
